attributes.action: Cut the level of duty and overall price of fuel to bring it to an acceptable level
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is time for the government to start listening to the populace of Great Britain and lower the duty and overall cost of fuel

rejection.details: There are many similar petitions, see http://search.petitions.pm.gov.uk/kbroker/number10/petitions/search.lsim?qt=reduce+fuel+duty&sr=0&nh=10&cs=&sc=number10&oq=camping+wales&sb=0&ha=1157&mt=0
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
